query.description: All unique measurements by Guillermo Diaz
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . FILTER regex(?actorname, "Guillermo Diaz", "i") . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All unique measurements with location name Heron Island
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . FILTER regex(?locname, "Heron Island", "i") . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All unique measurements in 0.1Deg box around Heron Island
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . FILTER (?lon <= 152.0 && ?lat <= -23.3) . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat . FILTER (?lon_end >= 151.8 && ?lat_end >= -23.5) } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All unique measurements at the Seab Site by Juan Carlos
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . FILTER regex(?locname, "Seab", "i") . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . FILTER regex(?actorname, "Juan Carlos Ortiz", "i") . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All the unique measurements between the coordinates
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . FILTER (?lon <= 156.8 && ?lat <= -15.5) . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat . FILTER (?lon_end >= 143.0 && ?lat_end >= -22.5) } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All unique measurements in date range
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . FILTER (?begindate >="2002-01-01T09:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime && ?enddate <="2008-06-30T23:59:59"^^xsd:dateTime) . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All unique measurements at the specified location
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . FILTER (?lat="-24.4"^^xsd:float && ?lon="152.2"^^xsd:float) . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . } ORDER BY ASC(?locationName)

query.description: All unique measurements with a specific unit
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?end_lon . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?end_lat } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . FILTER regex(?unitSymbol, "m²", "i") . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: All observations where a nearby sensor had a Max Temperature > 28 DegC in summer 2006.
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value WHERE { ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime1 . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end } . FILTER (?lon-?lon1 <=0.01 && ?lon1-?lon <= 0.01) . FILTER (?lat-?lat1 <=0.01 && ?lat1-?lat <= 0.01) . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . FILTER (?begindate >= "2005-12-01T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime) . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . FILTER (?enddate <= "2006-02-28T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime) } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location1 spatial:has_longitude ?lon1 . ?location1 spatial:has_latitude ?lat1 . OPTIONAL { ?location1 spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end1 . ?location1 spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end1 } . ?context context:has_location ?location1 . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . FILTER regex(?unitsymbol, "°C","i") . ?measurement1 event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement1 event:has_value ?value . FILTER (?value >28) . ?measurement1 event:has_characteristic physical:Sea_Water_Temperature_Instance . ?actor1 actor:has_name ?actorname1 . ?actor1 rdf:type physical:Sensor . ?instance1 event:has_context ?context . ?instance1 event:has_measurement ?measurement1 . ?instance1 rdf:type event:Environment_Sighting . }

query.description: All sightings of “Turf Algae” within Lat. 151:152 and Long. -23:-24 in a depth <=5m where the month of February MODIS SST had a max. temp >=27
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value ?depth WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . FILTER (?lon <= 152.0 && ?lat <= -23.0) . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end . FILTER (?lon_end >= 151.0 && ?lat_end >= -24.0) } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?location spatial:has_depth ?depth . FILTER (?depth < 5) . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?instance event:has_morphology ?morphology . FILTER regex(?morphology, "Turf","i") . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:of_target physical:Algae_Instance . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . FILTER (regex(str(?begindate), '200\d+?-02-\d{2}?')) . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . FILTER (regex(str(?enddate), '200\d+?-02-\d{2}?')) } . ?context1 context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location1 spatial:has_longitude ?lon1 . ?location1 spatial:has_latitude ?lat1 . FILTER (?lat1 <=-23.0 && ?lon1 <= 152.0) . OPTIONAL { ?location1 spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end1 . ?location1 spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end1 . FILTER (?lat_end1 >=-24.0 && ?lon_end1 >= 151.0) } . ?context1 context:has_location ?location1 . ?unit1 abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol1 . ?measurement1 event:has_unit ?unit1 . FILTER regex(?unitsymbol, "°C","i") . ?measurement1 event:has_value ?value . FILTER (?value >=27) . ?measurement1 event:has_characteristic physical:Sea_Surface_Temperature_Instance . ?actor1 actor:has_name ?actorname1 . FILTER regex(?actorname1, "MODIS Satellite Remote Sensor", "i") . ?instance1 event:has_actor ?actor1 . ?actor1 rdf:type physical:Sensor . ?instance1 event:has_context ?context1 . ?instance1 event:has_measurement ?measurement1 . ?instance1 rdf:type event:Environment_Sighting . }

query.description: What is the coral abundance on the reef flat at Heron Island and how does this change seasonally?
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value ?depth WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . FILTER (?begindate >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime) . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . FILTER (?enddate <= "2009-05-31T23:59:59"^^xsd:dateTime) } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . FILTER regex(?locname, "Heron Island", "i") . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?measurement event:has_characteristic abstract:Area_Instance . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:of_target physical:Coral_Instance . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: How has the algal diversity at Barren Island changed over the last 5 years?
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?genus ?species ?morphology ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value ?depth WHERE { ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . FILTER (?begindate >= "2004-01-01T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime) . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . FILTER (?enddate <= "2009-05-31T23:59:59"^^xsd:dateTime) } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end } . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . FILTER regex(?locname, "Barren Island", "i") . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?instance event:has_genus ?genus . ?instance event:has_species ?species . ?instance event:has_morphology ?morphology . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:of_target physical:Algae_Instance . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }

query.description: Find all time periods where intrusions of low chlorophyll waters onto the continental shelf coincide with in situ temperature data.
query.query_string:
PREFIX event: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Event#> PREFIX spatial: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Spatial#> PREFIX context: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Context#> PREFIX temporal: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Temporal#> PREFIX physical: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Physical#> PREFIX actor: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Actor#> PREFIX abstract: <http://maenad.itee.uq.edu.au/metadata/Abstract#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?instance ?target ?characteristic ?measurement ?begindate ?enddate ?actorname ?locname ?lat ?lat_end ?lon ?lon_end ?unitsymbol ?value ?depth WHERE { ?datetime1 temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime1 temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate } . ?context1 context:has_datetime ?datetime1 . ?location1 spatial:has_longitude ?lon1 . ?location1 spatial:has_latitude ?lat1 . OPTIONAL { ?location1 spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end1 . ?location1 spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end1 . ?context1 context:has_location ?location1 . ?measurement1 event:has_characteristic physical:Sea_Water_Temperature_Instance . ?instance1 event:has_context ?context1 . ?instance1 event:has_measurement ?measurement1 . ?instance1 rdf:type ?observation1 . ?observation1 rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . ?datetime temporal:has_datetime ?begindate . OPTIONAL { ?datetime temporal:has_end_datetime ?enddate . } . ?location spatial:has_longitude ?lon . ?location spatial:has_latitude ?lat . OPTIONAL { ?location spatial:has_end_longitude ?lon_end . ?location spatial:has_end_latitude ?lat_end . } . ?context context:has_datetime ?datetime . ?location spatial:has_name ?locname . ?context context:has_location ?location . ?unit abstract:has_description ?unitsymbol . ?measurement event:has_unit ?unit . ?measurement event:has_value ?value . FILTER (?value <=0.10) . ?characteristic_type abstract:has_description ?characteristic . ?measurement event:has_characteristic ?characteristic_type . ?actor actor:has_name ?actorname . ?instance event:has_actor ?actor . ?target_type abstract:has_description ?target . ?instance event:of_target ?target_type . ?instance event:of_target physical:Chlor_a_Instance . ?instance event:has_context ?context . ?instance event:has_measurement ?measurement . ?instance rdf:type ?observation . ?observation rdfs:subClassOf event:Observation . }
